#### PR description:

Modify the choice of wafer type from a study of radiation levels with Fluka simulation. Also added an additional method in HGCalGeometry to find area of individual cells - useful for evaluating signals at Digi level

#### PR validation:

Tested with the workflow as suggested in PR #26212

#### if this PR is a backport please specify the original PR:

These changes are to be added before freezing the V10 geometry of HGCal
